column4: When I try to copy this file, I get the following error message after typing  sudo cp \home\rgil\Desktop\temp\QuakeFiles\game000.pk4 \usr\local\games\quake4\q4base  ( cp: cannot stat `homergilDesktoptempQuakeFilesgame000.pk4': No such file or directory ) Why is it ignoring my backslash characters?
any security measure in ubuntu that actually makes sense is odd to windows users :)
